About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

Your project is in safe hands

I am outgoing, dedicated, and open-minded. I get across to people and adjust to changes with ease. I am comfortable dealing with high pressure work environments and manage tight deadlines well. I believe that a person should work on developing their professional skills and learn new things all the time. I am a self-proclaimed perpetual student, currently busy with my second master’s degree. I have also completed more online practical courses than I can mention. Above all else, I love code. I am code obsessed really ! Fortunately coding compliments my other two passions (data science and business) well. Outside of work, I enjoy competing in sport. I have provincial colours in squash, and I have had the fortune to represent my province at inter-provs 6 times.

B.COM Entrepreneurship

Program fostering innovation, underpinned by principles of business management. Campus and hostel living experience fostered and build great interpersonal skills

Masters in Business Leadership

Immersive 3-year business-centred program. The MBL provided me professional management development at postgraduate level, with particular emphasis on the practice of leadership. The program is focused on developing the leadership qualities of managers.I specialized in Finance Management within my final thesis

Master of Science: Data Analytics and Management Information Systems

Specialized data analytics program as it applies practically to business in a big data environment. The program's key focus is on statistical modelling especially as it applies to concepts of predictive analytics. The MSC also requires practical utilization of machine learning and AI algorithms together with utilization of data visualization tools and base algorithms to bring data to life in a business relevant way
